NPC.name: doggy
NPC.description: A demi doggy girl, squatting down comfortably in place minding her own business here. Her furry white tail floofy and wagging at the attention you give her while her floppy dog ears twitch slightly and she looks back at you. She's wearing naught but a collar and a loincloth, perhaps she's some sort of domesticated pet for the elves.

missText.text: the doggy's punch fails to connect with TARGET

hitText.text: the doggy hits TARGET for VALUE points of damage
